text: Krzywa is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Chojnów, west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 560. ==References== Krzywa
title: Krzywa, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
